infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: The Social Runner uses your location to find nearby running events and connect you with local running communities.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: The Social Runner uses your location to find nearby running events and connect you with local running communities.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: The Social Runner uses your camera to take profile photos and share running moments.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: The Social Runner accesses your photo library to select profile photos and share running achievements.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: The Social Runner may use your microphone for video sharing features.
infoPlist.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: The Social Runner can add running events to your calendar to help you stay organised.
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: The Social Runner can access your contacts to help you invite friends to running events.
infoPlist.NSMotionUsageDescription: The Social Runner uses motion data to track your running activities and provide better event recommendations.
